ua.nure.khshanovskyi.infoLife.service.topLewel.media.impl

Class MediaService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.nure.khshanovskyi.infoLife.service.topLewel.media.impl.MediaService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMediaService

    public class MediaService
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMediaService
    This service is implementation of IMediaService. This service work with DB and view interfaces and handle requests/response from DB and view interfaces.

      • createNewMedia

        public void createNewMedia(java.lang.String mediaName,
                           java.lang.String topic,
                           java.lang.String description,
                           java.lang.String uriImgLogo,
                           java.lang.String pdfUri,
                           int price,
                           int publicationInMonth)
        This is method creating a new Media object and after add into DB by MediaDaoMySql.searchFromSearchField(String) method.
        Specified by:
        createNewMedia in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        mediaName - - New media name
        topic - - Topic for sorting media
        description - - Short description for this media
        uriImgLogo - - name of picture for media
        pdfUri - - name of PDF file
        price - - price per one month
        publicationInMonth - - quantity publications in month

      • updateMediaNameService

        public void updateMediaNameService(java.lang.String mediaName,
                                   int mediaId)
        Update Media name by media id. Firstly call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaName(String, int) method for update media name, after call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaUpdateDateAndTime(Date, Time, int) method for install new date and time in "update_date" and "update_time" in DB.
        Specified by:
        updateMediaNameService in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        mediaName - - New media name
        mediaId - - id of media in DB

      • updateMediaDescriptionService

        public void updateMediaDescriptionService(java.lang.String description,
                                          int mediaId)
        Update Media description by media id. Firstly call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaDescription(String, int) method for update media description, after call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaUpdateDateAndTime(Date, Time, int) method for install new date and time in "update_date" and "update_time" in DB.
        Specified by:
        updateMediaDescriptionService in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        description - - new media description
        mediaId - - id of media in DB

      • updateMediaImageLogoUriService

        public void updateMediaImageLogoUriService(java.lang.String imgLogoUri,
                                           int mediaId,
                                           javax.servlet.http.Part part,
                                           java.lang.String pathToCreate,
                                           java.nio.file.Path pathToDelete)
        This method updating Media logo picture. Firstly call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaImageLogoUri(String, int) method for update media logo picture, after call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaUpdateDateAndTime(Date, Time, int) method for install new date and time in "update_date" and "update_time" in DB.
        Specified by:
        updateMediaImageLogoUriService in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        imgLogoUri - - new name of logo picture
        mediaId - - id of media in DB
        part - - a picture downloaded from view interface
        pathToCreate - - path where we need to put a new picture
        pathToDelete - - path where we need to delete old picture

      • updateMediaPdfUriService

        public void updateMediaPdfUriService(java.lang.String pdfUri,
                                     int mediaId,
                                     javax.servlet.http.Part part,
                                     java.lang.String pathToCreate,
                                     java.nio.file.Path pathToDelete)
        This method updating PDF file. Firstly call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaPdfUri(String, int) method for update media PDF URI, after call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaUpdateDateAndTime(Date, Time, int) method for install new date and time in "update_date" and "update_time" in DB.
        Specified by:
        updateMediaPdfUriService in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        pdfUri - - new name of PDF file
        mediaId - - id of media in DB
        part - - a PDF file downloaded from view interface
        pathToCreate - - path where we need to put a new PDF file
        pathToDelete - - path where we need to delete old PDF file

      • updateMediaTopicService

        public void updateMediaTopicService(java.lang.String topic,
                                    int mediaId)
        Update Media topic by media id. Firstly call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaTopic(String, int) method for update media topic, after call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaUpdateDateAndTime(Date, Time, int) method for install new date and time in "update_date" and "update_time" in DB.
        Specified by:
        updateMediaTopicService in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        topic - - new topic of media
        mediaId - - id of media in DB

        public void updateMediaPriceService(int price,
                                    int mediaId)

        Specified by:
        updateMediaPriceService in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        price - - new price
        mediaId - - id of media in DB

      • updateMediaPublicationsQuantityService

        public void updateMediaPublicationsQuantityService(int publicationsQuantity,
                                                   int mediaId)
        Update publications quantity in month by Media id. Firstly call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaPublicationsQuantity(int, int) method for update media publications quantity in month, after call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaUpdateDateAndTime(Date, Time, int) method for install new date and time in "update_date" and "update_time" in DB.
        Specified by:
        updateMediaPublicationsQuantityService in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        publicationsQuantity - - new publications quantity in month
        mediaId - - id of media in DB

      • updateMediaSubscribers

        public void updateMediaSubscribers(int newSubscribersQuantity,
                                   int mediaId)

Firstly call MediaDaoMySql.updateSubscribersQuantity(int, int) method for update subscribers on media, after call MediaDaoMySql.updateMediaUpdateDateAndTime(Date, Time, int) method for install new date and time in "update_date" and "update_time" in DB.
        Specified by:
        updateMediaSubscribers in interface IMediaService
        Parameters:
        newSubscribersQuantity - - new subscribers quantity
        mediaId - - id of media in DB
